install.title: Install Zikalyze
install.subtitle: Get the full app experience with offline access and quick launch
install.installedDesc: Zikalyze is installed on your device. You can find it on your home screen.
install.instructionsDesc: Follow the steps for your device

ios.step1Desc: Make sure you're viewing this page in Safari browser, not Chrome or another browser.
ios.step2Desc: Look for the share icon (square with arrow) at the bottom of your screen.
ios.step3Desc: Scroll down in the share menu and tap 'Add to Home Screen'.
ios.step4Desc: Confirm by tapping Add in the top right corner. The app icon will appear on your home screen.
